Foodster

A Mobile App that Leads to Street Food Goodness Everywhere!
Download About Us Contact Us

Our Goal

We aim to connect people, food and community with a one stop app that showcases all levels of street food.

What we Beleive

We beleive that we provide the many providers the chance to showcase what sets them apart from the next in addition to allowing the community to quantify that at take part, deciding who's the best. If you make great food, you are always a winner!

Community

Our goal, 1st and foremost is to bring people together, to identify what makes us unique and similar, we love food and aim to make the world a better place!
